Package edu.greenblitz.gblib.hid

Class SmartJoystick

java.lang.Object
edu.greenblitz.gblib.hid.SmartJoystick
public class SmartJoystick extends Object
This class is in charge of making the Joystick easy to assign things to buttons and invert the axes of the joystick. The class uses m_joystick as the main joystick, and uses button values and enums in order to assign thing to those buttons.
See Also:
  • Joystick
  • JoystickButton

  • Constructor Details

    • SmartJoystick

      public SmartJoystick(int joystick_port, double deadzone)
      This constructor constructs the joystick based on the joystick port we give it.
      Parameters:
      joystick_port - The port of the joystick.
      deadzone - values if the stick below it will count as 0.

    • SmartJoystick

      public SmartJoystick(int joystick_port)
      This constructor constructs the joystick based on the joystick port we give it.
      Parameters:
      joystick_port - The port of the joystick.

    • SmartJoystick

      public SmartJoystick(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick stick, double deadzone)
      This constructor uses a joystick and assigns it button values and numbers.
      Parameters:
      stick - The joystick object.
      deadzone - values if the stick below it will count as 0.

    • bind

      public void bind(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick stick)
      This function binds a joystick using a joystick object.
      Parameters:
      stick - This stick object which we bind the joystick to.

    • bind

      public void bind(int port)
      This function binds a joystick using a joystick port.
      Parameters:
      port - The port of the joystick which we bind the joystick to.

    • getRawAxis

      public double getRawAxis(int raw_axis)
      This function returns the axis based on an axis number.
      Parameters:
      raw_axis - The axis number we want to return.
      Returns:
      A joystick axis based off of the joystick axis number.

    • getRawJoystick

      public edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick getRawJoystick()
      This function returns a joystick
      Returns:

    • rumble

      public void rumble(boolean left, double power)
      Rumbles the controller at a certain side
      Parameters:
      left - rumble side (false for left)
      power - normalized rumble [0, 1]
